Author: Lunaseki
Text: Hm be careful because fatigue is a symptom of refeeding syndrome. If you’re underweight you might be malnourished (esp because you’ve been eating so little) and at risk.   Please go to your doctor... and listen to your body. If you aren’t hungry, don’t force yourself to eat until you get a medical opinion

Author: isthised
Text: Please work with a doctor to monitor your lab work to make sure you’re not experiencing refeeding syndrome.   But yes, once you’re medically stable, it does get physically better.
